product_name: Mountain Hardwear Nitrous Down Vest - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: After the sun goes down on your day of hiking, climbing and having fun in the backcountry, keep warm with the power of 800-fill down in the Mountain Hardwear Nitrous Vest. 800-fill goose down wraps your core in warmth, and quilted construction keeps the down from shifting, avoiding cold spots. Ripstop polyester shell is downproof and incredibly light, and it has a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed light moisture and stains. Features an interior draft flap behind the front zipper and a chin guard lined with soft microfiber chamois to protect against zipper abrasion. 1-hand-adjustable hem drawcord; zippered hand pockets. Stuffs into own pocket. Closeout.
